mapper.select: select a.position_id as currentPosId, c.* from t_task_person a inner join sys_user_post b on a.position_id = b.post_id inner join sys_user c on b.user_id = c.id and a.dpt_id = c.dpt_id where a.task_id=#{taskId} and a.person_type = 1 and c.is_del != 1

select a.shop_id as currentShopId, c.* from t_task_person a inner join t_shop_info b on a.shop_id = b.id inner join sys_user c on b.shop_manager_id = c.id where a.task_id=#{taskId} and a.person_type = 1 and c.is_del != 1 and b.is_del != 1

select distinct a.* from sys_user a inner join t_task_person b on a.dpt_id = b.dpt_id inner join sys_user_post c on a.id = c.user_id and b.position_id = c.post_id inner join sys_user_brand d on d.user_id = a.id inner join sys_user_area e on e.user_id = a.id inner join t_brand_info f on f.id = d.brand_id and f.is_del != 1 inner join sys_area g on g.id = e.area_id and g.is_del != 1 inner join t_shop_info h on h.brand_id = f.id and h.area_id = g.id and h.is_del != 1 where b.task_id = #{taskId} and b.person_type = 2 and h.shop_manager_id = #{userId} and a.is_del != 1

select distinct a.* from sys_user a inner join sys_user_post b on a.id = b.post_id inner join t_task_person c on c.position_id = b.post_id and a.dpt_id = c.dpt_id where c.task_id = #{taskId} and c.person_type = 2 and a.is_del != 1
select distinct a.* from sys_user a inner join sys_user_shop b on a.id = b.user_id where b.shop_id = #{shopId} and a.dpt_id = #{deptId} and a.is_del != 1
select a.* from sys_user a inner join sys_user_relation b on a.id = b.parent_user_id where b.user_id = #{userId} and b.dpt_id = #{deptId} and b.post_id = #{positionId} limit 1
select distinct a.* from sys_post a inner join sys_user_post b on a.id = b.post_id inner join sys_user c on b.user_id = c.id where c.is_del != 1 and c.dpt_id = #{deptId}
